name: Feed That Chicken!
description:
This is a School Project

This Prototype Is Fully Working.

This game is made for my Elective Module AI. Can you keep all the chickens alive?

Story

It was a sunny Sunday when suddenly all of the chickens got the weird very hungry virus. This means that they need to be fed way more often than they were used to. And this task is given to you, the chosen one!

Created by Tom Renkema.
